attributes.action: Amend the law making it impossible for any businesses to avoid paying taxes.
attributes.additional_details: My Mother recently received excellent care for cancer. She had treatment for nearly 2 years leading to a 12 hour operation. I have often wondered what would have happened if we had no NHS!....we would have both had to sell our homes to pay for the treatment. I thank my lucky stars often for a lot our country has to offer........but it is being dismantled and must stop. We need to fund our services.
attributes.background: Too many services have closed or are at breaking point due to a massive reduction in funding. We are led to believe it is because we are a nation of scroungers; i strongly disagree. If all organisations paid a fair amount of tax, the UK will be able to support our vulnerable and those in need.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about tax avoidance, but we're not sure exactly what change you'd like to see.

There is already something called the General Anti-Abuse Rule (GAAR). you can find out more about this here:

http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN06265/SN06265.pdf

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you'd like to be made to the laws on tax.
